text: Extreme Rules was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE), which took place on June 7, 2009 at the New Orleans Arena in New Orleans, Louisiana. This was the fifth show in the lineage of the One Night Stand event. ==Results== # Matches Stipulations Time Dark Match Mickie James and Kelly Kelly defeated Beth Phoenix and Rosa Mendes Tag Team match 1 Kofi Kingston (c) defeated Montel Vontavious Porter, William Regal and Matt Hardy Fatal Four-Way match for the WWE United States Championship 06:43 2 Chris Jericho defeated Rey Mysterio (c) No Holds Barred match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 14:46 3 CM Punk defeated Umaga Samoan Strap match 09:02 4 Tommy Dreamer defeated Christian (c) and Jack Swagger Triple Threat Hardcore match for the ECW Championship 09:41 5 Santina Marella defeated Vickie Guerrero (c) and Chavo Guerrero Handicap Hog Pen match for the title of "Miss WrestleMania" 02:45 6 Batista defeated Randy Orton (c) Steel Cage match for the WWE Championship 07:07 7 John Cena defeated The Big Show Submission match 19:04 8 Jeff Hardy defeated Edge (c) Ladder match for the World Heavyweight Championship 20:18 9 CM Punk defeated Jeff Hardy (c) Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 01:03 ==Related pages== *WWE One Night Stand *List of WWE pay-per-view events ==References== Category:2009 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Extreme Rules Category:Sports in New Orleans Category:2009 in American television Category:2000s in Louisiana Category:21st century in New Orleans Category:June 2009 events
title: Extreme Rules (2009)
